contentrichtext.text: '''Silver dollar''' may refer to: * A [[Dollar coin (disambiguation)|dollar coin]] made of any white metal, especially one made of silver * [[Silver dollar (fish)]], a name given to various fish species * A type of [[Pancake#North America|pancake]] * [[Silver Dollar (film)|''Silver Dollar'' (film)]], a 1932 film starring Edward G. Robinson * [[Silver Dollar, Ontario]], Canada, a community ==See also== * [[Sylvestro Carolla]], New Orleans gangster known as "Sam 'Silver Dollar'" * [[James Marion West, Jr.]], Texas oilman known as "Silver Dollar Jim" for throwing coins to passersby on the street * [[Silver Dollar City]], a theme park in Missouri {{disambig}}
